name: in_clause
db.system.name: other_sql
query: SELECT * FROM table WHERE value IN (123, 456, 'abc')
db.query.text: SELECT * FROM table WHERE value IN (?)
SELECT * FROM table WHERE value IN (?, ?, ?)

name: comments
db.system.name: other_sql
query:
SELECT column -- end of line comment
FROM /* block 
 comment */ table

name: insert_into_select
db.system.name: other_sql
query:
INSERT INTO shipping_details
(order_id,
address)
SELECT order_id,
address
FROM   orders
WHERE  order_id = 1
db.query.text:
INSERT INTO shipping_details
(order_id,
address)
SELECT order_id,
address
FROM   orders
WHERE  order_id = ?

name: select_nested_query
db.system.name: other_sql
query:
SELECT order_date
FROM   (SELECT *
FROM   orders o
JOIN customers c
ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id)
db.query.text:
SELECT order_date
FROM   (SELECT *
FROM   orders o
JOIN customers c
ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id)

name: select_nested_query_case_preserved
db.system.name: other_sql
query:
SELEcT order_date
FROM   (sELECT *
FROM   orders o
JOIN customers c
ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id)
db.query.text:
SELEcT order_date
FROM   (sELECT *
FROM   orders o
JOIN customers c
ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id)

query: SELECT * FROM Orders o CROSS JOIN OrderDetails od
db.query.text: SELECT * FROM Orders o CROSS JOIN OrderDetails od

name: cross_join_comma_separated_syntax

query: SELECT * FROM Orders o, OrderDetails od
